greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of the harmonic mean of the first n octagonal numbers.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: a(3) = 504 because the first 3 octagonal numbers are [1,8,21], and 3/(1/1+1/8+1/21) = 504/197.
results.author: _Colin Barker_, Nov 21 2014
